title: Google\Cloud\Vision\V1\InputConfig
name: InputConfig
description:
The desired input location and metadata.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.vision.v1.InputConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.gcs_source
params.description: The Google Cloud Storage location to read the input from.

params.name: data.content
params.description: File content, represented as a stream of bytes. Note: As with all bytes fields, protobuffers use a pure binary representation, whereas JSON representations use base64. Currently, this field only works for BatchAnnotateFiles requests. It does not work for AsyncBatchAnnotateFiles requests.

params.name: data.mime_type
params.description: The type of the file. Currently only "application/pdf", "image/tiff" and "image/gif" are supported. Wildcards are not supported.
